website_summaries.verdict: There’s no easier way to line your shelf or desktop with all of your favorite Angry Birds characters than by buying one of these inexpensive figurine sets.
pros: Features hard plastic figures of Red, Bomb, Eagle, Stella, Terance, and a pair of pigs
cons: They’re a little on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Very small and made of hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not reading the reviews properly... These are hard plastic and tiny. You can fit the entire set in palm of your hand. They are fine for display on the shelf with good level of detail on each character...but not much else. Too small to use in an angry bird game, too easy to lose and it doesn't come with any props.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: They are really cute, but small. But they are perfect for my 3 years olds hand because he is obsessed with angry birds. I’ve added them in their Easter basket hiding them in the eggs and it was fun to open each egg and see which bird is inside it. I bought both sets A and B and they are nice. We didn’t use the recent thingy and arrow thingy in the package, because they were made out of paper and were so hard to pull off the white plastic holder that they ripped, so we only used the toys. You can see them in my hand how small they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but different from pictures
customer_reviews.text: It is what we expected, but it’s not entirely what’s pictured. There is a pilot pig and a tourist pig in every descriptive photo, and we did get the pilot pig but the other one is unadorned. My kid won’t let me return the set because he’s playing with the characters. And we destroyed the packaging opening it, anyway (we had to). So he was disappointed but not enough to be patient through the exchange process. Just know that what you order and what you get might not exactly match up.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gatannah

customer_reviews.title: Well made small toys
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, sturdy toys. My grandsons (9&5) love them and add them to the angry birds sets and with their other toys (they are often drafted into the military when they set up that). I disagree that they are too little to play with, however they are not the right toy for babies. Thaw signs you see on the plastic cover are cardboard and are glued to the plastic. Might be possible to cut them out.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Yes these figures are small but they are super cute, i wish they were a bit lighter tho because when you have a younger brother/sister that likes to throw things around they might cause some damages. Also, i would advise you if you decide to get these to keep them away from water, my 4 yrs old son decided to put red in water for 5 mns and then some of the beige color on his tummy faded.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Cake toppers not toys
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a cake topper. I wouldn’t let little children play with these as they will put them in their mouth and choke.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: Angry birds movie
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. This are the angry birds from the angry birds movie.
customer_reviews.author: Jeru

customer_reviews.title: If some mini figures were missing
customer_reviews.text: Hi I'm confused. In my order there was suppose to be 12 figures and there was only 10. I m not sure if I ordered the right ones. Please check and let me know. Thank you Carla LaPointe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: They are just the cutest little things The figurines were made well and true to the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rainier

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift for son who loves angry birds everything. Great quality

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love angry birds!
customer_reviews.text: Angry birds are so hard to find. Perfect purchase for my child.

customer_reviews.title: so these are perfect. The only problem is that Chuck is not ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with angry birds. And he’s in this phase where he holds small toys all day, so these are perfect. The only problem is that Chuck is not included. He’s a main character!

customer_reviews.title: but still awesome. They fit into surprise eggs and are great ...
customer_reviews.text: The toys are hard plastic. They are smaller then I thought they would be... but still awesome. They fit into surprise eggs and are great little toys! My son loves Angry birds! He loved these little toys they go great with the building block set he already has, he can play angry birds live with blocks.

customer_reviews.title: Very Detailed but TINY
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and detailed but when they say "mini" they aren't kidding. I'd say they are about an inch tall each. My son loved them though. I'm not sure the value for the price is there.

product_meta.title: Angry Birds Movie Mini Figure Multi Pack Set A (7 Piece)
product_meta.description: Angry Birds Collectible Figures are approx 1.5" tall. They are highly detailed film replica, from the Angry Birds Motion Picture.
feature_bullets: 13 Characters in all to collect, This set contains , Red, Stella, Bomb, Terence, Eagle , Tourist Pig & The Pilot Pig
From the new 2016 Angry Birds Movie
Red, Stella, Bomb, Terence, Eagle, Tourist Pig, Pilot Pig

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars270 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
